welcome: Welcome to pndek.in! This application allows you to shorten long URLs into easily shareable short URLs. By using this application, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
use-of-service-content-1: You may only use this application for lawful and legal purposes.
use-of-service-content-2: You are prohibited from using this application to:
use-of-service-content-2-2: Infringe upon the copyrights, trademarks, or intellectual property rights of others.
use-of-service-content-2-3: Send spam or unwanted promotional materials.
use-of-service-content-2-4: Distribute malware or other harmful content.
use-of-service-content-2-6: Disrupt or damage the integrity of systems.
use-of-service-content-2-7: Engage in any other activities that harm others.
prohibited-content-1: Creating short links to content that:
prohibited-content-2: The application reserves the right to delete short links that violate these terms without prior notice.
user-responsibility-content-1: You are responsible for all activities that occur through your account.
user-responsibility-content-2: You agree to maintain the security of your password and not share it with others.
user-responsibility-content-3: Promptly notify the application if you suspect any unauthorized activity on your account.
limitation-of-liability-content-1: The application is not liable for any losses or damages arising from the use of this application.
limitation-of-liability-content-2: You agree to release the application from all liability for any such losses or damages.
service-termination-content-1: The application may terminate your access to this application at any time, without any reason.
term-change-content-1: The application may change these Terms of Service at any time.
term-change-content-2: By continuing to use this application after changes are announced, you are deemed to have agreed to those changes.
contact-content-1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at me@jaluwibowo.id
